Verses: 1 kangaanippai Virumpugiravan Nallavelaiyai Virumpugiraan, Idhu Unmaiyaana Vaarththai.

2 aagaiyaal Kangaaniyaanavan Kutranjsaattappadaathavanum, Ore Manaiviyai Udaiya Purushanum, Jaakkiradhaiyullavanum, Thelindha Puththiyullavanum, Yokkiyadhaiyullavanum, Anniyarai Ubasarikkiravanum, Podhagasamarththanumaai Irukkavendum.
3 avan Madhubaanappiriyanum, Adikkiravanum, Izhivaana Aadhaayaththai Ichchikkiravanumaayiraamal, Porumaiyullavanum, Sandaipannaadhavanum, Pana Aasaiyillaadhavanumaayirundhu,
4 than Sondhak Kudumbaththai Nandraai Nadaththugiravanum, Than Pillaigalai Sagala Nallozhukkamullavargalaagak Keezhppadiyappannugiravanumaayirukkavendum.
5 oruvan Than Sondhak Kudumbaththai Nadaththa Ariyaadhirundhaal, Dhevanudaiya Sabaiyai Eppadi Visaarippaan?
6 avan Irumaappadaindhu, Pisaasu Adaindha Aakkinaiyile Vizhaadhapadikku, Noodhana Seeshanaayirukkakkoodaathu.
7 avan Nindhanaiyilum, Pisaasin Kanniyilum Vizhaadhapadikku, Purampaanavargalaal Narsaatchi Petravanaayumirukkavendum.
8 andhappadiye, Udhavikkaararum Irunaakkullavargalaayum, Madhubaanappiriyaraayum, Izhivaana Aadhaayaththai Ichchikkiravargalaayum Iraamal, Nallozhukkamullavargalaayum,
9 visuvaasaththin Ragasiyaththai Suththa Manasaatchiyile Kaaththukkollugiravargalaayum Irukkavendum.
10 melum, Ivargal Munnadhaagach Sodhikkappadavendum; Kutranjsaattappadaathavargalaanaal Udhavikkaararaaga Oozhiyanjseyyalaam.
11 andhappadiye Sthireegalum Nallozhukkamullavargalum, Avadhoorupannaadhavargalum, Thelindha Buththiyullavargalum Ellaavatrileyum Unmaiyullavargalumaayirukkavendum.
12 melum, Udhavikkaararaanavargal Ore Manaiviyaiyudaiya Purusharumaai, Thangal Pillaigalaiyum Sondhak Kudumbangalaiyum Nandraai Nadaththugiravargalumaayirukkavendum.
13 ippadi Udhavikkaararudaiya Oozhiyaththai Nandraaich Seygiravargal Thangalukku Nalla Nilaiyaiyum, Kiristhu Yesuvaippatrum Visuvaasaththil Migundha Dhairiyaththaiyum Adaivaargal.

15 thaamadhippenaagil, Dhevanudaiya Veettile Nadakkavendiya Vagaiyai Nee Ariyumpadi Ivaigalai Unakku Ezhudhugiren; Andha Veedu Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Sabaiyaai Saththiyaththukkuth Thoonum Aadhaaramumaayirukkiradhu.

16 andriyum, Dhevabakdhikkuriya Ragasiyamaanadhu Yaavarum Oppukkollugirapadiye Magaa Menmaiyulladhu. Dhevan Maamsaththile Velippattaar, Aaviyile Needhiyullavarendru Vilangappattaar, Dhevathoodhargalaal Kaanappattaar, Purajaadhigalidaththil Pirasangikkappattaar, Ulagaththile Visuvaasikkappattaar, Magimaiyile Ereduththukkollappattaar.
